about_the_game:
In Tea Shop Simulator, you get to :
●Make various type of drinks, add different toppings and try your best to satisfy customers.
●Manage the time well and add the right amount of toppings.
●The quality of your drinks will affect your score and popularity of your shop.
●Making drinks can also be satisfying with the in-game audio and hilarious physics you can play around with.

Being a shop owner isn't easy, you have to :
●Restock different types of supplies and consumables.
●Boil tea and clean up the mess you made.
●Finding your own pace on doing the errands is the key to a successful tea shop.

●Spending on the decorations and furnitures for your tea shop can be a good idea, the customers prefer clean and stylized shops.
●You can place the items anywhere you want and create your one and only tea shop in town.

●By completing different tasks, you can unlock more type of tea and missions, doing tasks can also increase your shop's popularity.
●Making smart choices during tasks can also affect how well your shop is going to do in the future.

short_description: In "Tea Shop Simulator", players get to experience the process of making different drinks, and invest money to gain popularity or buy decorations for the store, customize your store, make smart uses of your money, and build your own tea shop empire in Tea Shop Simulator.
